headline: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) Expands Global Payments Capabilities And Partners With Perplexity
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) launched "PayPal Complete Payments" for businesses across Singapore, facilitating payments in over 200 markets. This introduction coincided with a 16.72% rise in the company's share price over the past month. Additionally, the new partnership with Perplexity to enable agentic commerce could have contributed positively. Market trends, notably in the tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite, showed an overall bullish sentiment. PayPal’s financial performance, highlighted by...
